selected_quotes: Our PrimeView on Obstructive sleep #apnoea syndrome focuses on diagnosis
Diagnosis of obstructive sleep #apnoea is based on medical history, clinical examination and sleep recordings
#SleepApnoea can lead to excessive daytime sleepiness and cardiovascular and metabolic comorbidities
